author: MSNBC
title: Roger Stone sues in bid to block Jan. 6 committee subpoena of phone records
description: Roger Stone, a staunch Trump ally, filed a lawsuit Thursday seeking to prevent AT&T from turning over his phone records to the congressional committee
content: Roger Stone, a staunch Trump ally, filed a lawsuit Thursday seeking to prevent AT&T from turning over his phone records to the congressional committee investigating the Jan. 6 attack on the U.S. â€¦ [+2680 chars]
